algorithm

Class Selection

  • java.lang.Object
    • algorithm.Selection

  • public class Selection
extends java.lang.Object
    Selection method for the chromosomes which uses the roulette wheel selection method, it takes a fitness distribution of chromosomes and operates as an iterator to select chromosomes from the population.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static java.lang.Double EPSILON 
      private java.lang.Double leftBound 
      private java.util.Random random 
      private java.lang.Double rightBound 
      private java.util.LinkedHashMap<Chromosome,com.google.common.collect.Range<java.lang.Double>> selection 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Selection(java.util.Random random)
      Create an instance of the selection iterator which uses roulette wheel selection to select the chromosomes.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void init(java.util.HashMap<Chromosome,java.lang.Double> fitness)
      Initialize the selection iterator with the fitness distribution of the chromosomes which is used to generate the selection range of chromosomes for the roulette wheel selection method.
      Chromosome next()
      The iterator method which uses roulette wheel selection to get the next chromosome to be used for the genetic algorithm.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Selection

        public Selection(java.util.Random random)
        Create an instance of the selection iterator which uses roulette wheel selection to select the chromosomes.
        Parameters:
        random - The random number generator to use for the selection.

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public void init(java.util.HashMap<Chromosome,java.lang.Double> fitness)
        Initialize the selection iterator with the fitness distribution of the chromosomes which is used to generate the selection range of chromosomes for the roulette wheel selection method. Each range is defined as the left closed and right open, e.g. [0, 3)
        Parameters:
        fitness - The fitness distribution for the chromosomes to be used for generating the selection ranges.

      • next

        public Chromosome next()
                throws java.lang.ArithmeticException
        The iterator method which uses roulette wheel selection to get the next chromosome to be used for the genetic algorithm. NOTE: The selection method creates a DEEP copy of the object rather than by references to prevent crossover/mutation collision if the same chromosome is selected multiple times.
        Returns:
        The next chromosome selected using roulette wheel selection
        Throws:
        java.lang.ArithmeticException
